title: Plum Blossom Festival
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Rina-chan, I heard it’s plum blossom season.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Really? I’d love to go see them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Do you wanna go to a plum blossom festival? There are gonna be lots of food stalls and other things to do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I didn’t know there were events like that. Flower viewing is such a broad activity.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Why don’t we invite the others to come with us too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Sure. Rina-chan Board says, “Excited.”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Alright, let’s go ask them~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, before we go, I have something to ask you...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Even though there are food stalls, I want to have one of your bento boxes, Emma-chan. I love your sandwiches.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Fufu, sure~! I’ll make all of Rina-chan’s favorite things!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
